athena:
Tests LVL2 and EF ID full scan instance of tracking algorithms in the di-jet sample - merged data preparation FullScan on di-jet events EventMax=1000;doMergedDataPrep=True TrigInDetValidation_RTT_topOptions_MonitorSlice Trigger/TrigValidation/TrigInDetValidation TrigInDetValidation long
# include "samples/TrigInDetValidation_minBias_sample0.xml"
RttLibraryTools ExeRunner
exeName TIDArdict.exe
exeParamString TIDAdata11-rtt.dat -f data-monitor-merge.root -b Test_bin.dat
RttLibraryTools ExeRunner
exeName TIDAcomparitor.exe
exeParamString data-monitor-merge.root data-monitor-merge-reference.root EF_InDetMonMergeDP_FS_InDetTrigParticleCreation_FullScan_EFID -d EF-plots
RttLibraryTools ExeRunner
exeName TIDAcomparitor.exe
exeParamString data-monitor-merge.root data-monitor-merge-reference.root L2_InDetMonMergeDP_FS_TrigL2SiTrackFinder_FullScan_0 L2_InDetMonMergeDP_FS_TrigL2SiTrackFinder_FullScan_1 L2_InDetMonMergeDP_FS_TrigL2SiTrackFinder_FullScan_2 L2_InDetMonMergeDP_FS_TrigL2SiTrackFinder_FullScan_3 -d L2-plots
# include "TrigInDetValidation_expertMonitoring.xml" # include "TrigInDetValidation_costMonitoring.xml"
RTT:Top CheckFileRunner0
TIDAdata*.dat data-monitor-merge-reference.root expert-monitoring-minBias_mergeDataPrep-ref.root # include "TrigInDetValidation_aux.xml" Test_bin.dat
